abstract: Former Cuban Pres Fidel Castro makes his first public appearance in more than a year, greeting Venezuelan visitors as they tour a school in Havana.
lead_paragraph: It was his first appearance since his brother, President Raúl Castro, and President Obama announced in December that the United States and Cuba would normalize diplomatic relations.

headline.main: Fidel Castro Appears in Public for First Time in 14 Months
headline.print_headline: Castro Appears in Public for First Time in 14 Months

snippet: It was his first appearance since his brother, President Raúl Castro, and President Obama announced in December that the United States and Cuba would normalize diplomatic relations.
